name: MEWP
description:
Game Jam #2 by the UEFR community (Theme : Electrical Failure)

Master the M.E.W.P: Mobile Elevating Working Platform and bring the pink guy to the electrical failures so he can fix them with his mind power. Also don't make him fall.

This game is hard. Good luck and sorry...

Made by :
Kyra
Yaos (Pablo Malmerida)

Assets used:

Modular Industrial Area by Next Level 3D

Twin Motion Pack by Twin Motion

Hard Surface Kitbash by Jonas Ronnegard
